locations.name: Aisha's Master Bedroom
locations.description: Master bedroom in a three-bedroom Minneapolis townhouse. Queen bed with burgundy comforter, multiple decorative pillows. Prayer rug folded neatly beside the bed. Small bookshelf with Quran, Somali novels, and family photo albums. Dresser with neatly folded and hung hijab collection in various colors (purple, teal, burgundy, cream). Family photos on the wall and dresser top. Window showing Minneapolis winter trees or gray sky. Warm beige walls. Orange tabby cat (Basra) often curled on the bed. Digital alarm clock and reading glasses on the nightstand. Warm, modest, family-centered space.
key_features: queen bed with burgundy comforter and decorative pillows
small bookshelf with Quran and Somali novels
dresser with hijab collection (purple, teal, burgundy, cream)
family photos on wall and dresser

lighting_conditions.morning: soft gray winter light through window
lighting_conditions.evening: warm bedside lamp glow, overhead light

variations: wide shot showing bed and prayer rug
dresser with hijab collection and photos
nightstand and window view with cat on bed

locations.prompt_template: anime illustration, masterpiece, master bedroom in Minneapolis townhouse, queen bed with burgundy comforter, decorative pillows, prayer rug folded beside bed, small bookshelf with books, dresser with neatly folded colorful hijabs, family photos, warm beige walls, orange tabby cat on bed, digital alarm clock, winter light through window, warm modest bedroom
locations.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, low quality, luxury bedroom, messy room, dark colors, scary, inappropriate content, summer setting

ip_adapter_strength.notes: Maintain warm, modest bedroom atmosphere with Somali American cultural elements

locations.name: Master Bathroom
locations.description: Master bathroom in Minneapolis townhouse. Bathtub/shower combo with shower curtain. Single sink with cabinet underneath. Mirror above sink. Wudu-friendly layout (ablution before prayer). Modest toiletries on counter: face cream, hair products, comb, hair ties. Towels hanging on rack. Bright overhead light. Clean and practical. Small rug on tile floor.
key_features: bathtub/shower combo with plain shower curtain
modest toiletries (face cream, hair products, comb)
hair ties and pins on counter

lighting_conditions.morning: bright overhead light with some natural light

locations.prompt_template: anime illustration, masterpiece, modest master bathroom in townhouse, bathtub shower combo with plain curtain, single sink with cabinet, mirror, modest toiletries, towel rack, bright overhead light, small rug on tile floor, clean practical bathroom, water cup near sink
locations.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, low quality, luxury bathroom, dirty bathroom, adult-only items, dark, scary, large bathroom

ip_adapter_strength.notes: Maintain clean, modest bathroom with practical wudu-friendly elements

locations.name: Hoyo's Kitchen Restaurant Kitchen
locations.description: Commercial kitchen of Hoyo's Kitchen, a small Somali restaurant in Cedar-Riverside, Minneapolis. Stainless steel prep tables, commercial gas stove with large pots, deep fryer for sambusa, large commercial rice cooker, well-stocked spice rack (cumin, coriander, turmeric, cardamom, cinnamon), walk-in refrigerator door visible, order tickets hanging on a wire above the pass, aprons hanging on hooks by the door, hand-washing station with soap dispenser, halal meat section in refrigerator, stacks of takeout containers, menu board visible through the service window. Bright fluorescent lighting. Busy, organized, professional cooking space.
key_features: commercial gas stove with large pots
spice rack (cumin, coriander, turmeric, cardamom, cinnamon)
order tickets on wire above pass

variations: stove area with large pots and spice rack
prep tables with cutting boards and ingredients
service window with order tickets and menu board

locations.prompt_template: anime illustration, masterpiece, small commercial restaurant kitchen, stainless steel prep tables, commercial gas stove with large pots, deep fryer, large rice cooker, spice rack with colorful spices, order tickets on wire, aprons on hooks, hand-washing station, takeout containers stacked, menu board through service window, bright fluorescent lighting, busy professional kitchen
locations.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, low quality, home kitchen, dirty kitchen, dark, scary, fast food, chain restaurant, huge industrial kitchen

ip_adapter_strength.notes: Maintain small commercial kitchen atmosphere with Somali restaurant elements

generation_settings.model: Animagine XL 3.1 or equivalent anime SDXL model
generation_settings.notes: Generate 3 reference images per location. Ensure bedroom and bathroom reflect modest Somali American home. Restaurant kitchen should look like a small commercial operation, not a home kitchen.

usage_instructions.step_1: Generate location reference images using prompts above
usage_instructions.step_2: Review and select best images for each location
usage_instructions.step_4: Use selected references with IP-Adapter during scene generation
usage_instructions.step_5: Maintain consistency by using same references for all scenes in that location

notes.rationale: Capture Somali American home style and small commercial kitchen with cultural authenticity
notes.cultural_elements: Hijab collection, prayer rug, Quran, Somali spices, halal practices, wudu-friendly bathroom, Minneapolis winter setting
notes.character_home_style: Working-class Somali American family, modest but warm townhouse, strong cultural identity
